column4: ta, but i lost my grub instal, and a faulty partiton has lost my ubuntu that was installed there. I only need to gain access to my old windoqws drive because i wont boot and was last shut down with hibernate so it's unmountable. all I want to do is a new istall of ubuntu filling the whole drive after recovering everything off first
but when you boot ubuntu live, you can not mount the windows drive?
sorry, I misread. you want to restore the windows boot loader.
